extension.name: quick lookup for the autocomplete in the navigation
extension.description:
This extension improves the default search in several ways: - avoid "pointless" requests by waiting at least 3 chars - more efficient and faster requests (optimised sql) - search in the start of the names not in the middle (first or last). - adjust the queries based on the number of results. The aim is to provide the most relevant results at the top, all the time - you can enter the contact id and it will go directly to the contact page - improved presentation of the results
Just try it, you will like it;)
Current limitations: - the result only includes the name and email. The address and phones are skipped for performance reasons. Shouldn't be too complicated to add them (hint, hint)
